prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, Brass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, and Brass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, and Brass, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This song has Drums, Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, and Brass, but Piano is not part of it.
